summary: This is my ENB based on Ghost ENB. I have rights to post it :)
descriptionHtml:
Hi :)

After monthos of making this ENB it is finally done!
[b][i]
[size=4][font=Verdana][center]Instalation[/center]
[/font][/size][/i][/b]Go to the skyrimprefs.ini and be sure that under [Display] section:

fGamma=0.6400
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

If not - coppy and paste missing components :)

I included NLA plugin - be sure to enble it before launching game via NMM / launcher!!!

Download and install enbseries v0.279 and enbhost.exe.
[size=4][center][font=Verdana][i][b]Other[/b][/i][/font][/center][/size]
So far it's not compatible with any weather / lightning mod like CoT, RLO, ELE, ELFX or Pure Weathers, etc. I'm going to make some patch in the near future.

My expirience with making ENB is 1.5 year now so i know more less what i'm doing and i can help You if needed ^^

I wan't You to post every thing that doesn't match ss like for example "My sun rays are to strong" or"My sky is completly white" or "I can't see shadows" etc so i can helpÂ You and improve my ENB - Keep in mind that i was working on moded Skyrim ;)

When You taking SS be sure to take it via prtscr not Steam because those are low res and bloomed. You can find the SS in your game folder, open it with Paint and save as png for example, because Nexus doesnt read .BMP files.

Have a fun :D
author: xraylukas
